channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024040069
item.description:
Report X-2024040069

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED A CALL TO DOOR 164, USED PROTECTION GEAR TO RESPOND TO CALL, NOTICED IT WAS A HAZMAT PLACED ON PROTECTION GEAR, GRABBED DECISSION TREE TO FOLLOW THE PROCESS, RETREAVED PACKAGE, AND RETURNED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROSESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024040051
item.description:
Report X-2024040051

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-27
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR HAZMAT LEAKER ON THE BOXLINE. UPON ARRIVAL SAW THE PACKAGE ON THE GROUND WHERE THE LOADER HAD PLACE IT AFTER NOTICING A STAIN ON THE BOX'S CORNER. UPON INSPECTING THE BOX RESPONDER SAW THE CLASS 3 DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL AND SHIPPING PAPERS. CONTAINED THE BOX IN A SPILL TUB AND RETURNED IT TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
